bibl.title: The Language of Greek Comedy.
bibl.note: 10 essays, first delivered as papers to the Corpus Christi Classical Seminar on 'The Language of Greek Comedy' at the University of Oxford in Michaelmas Term 1999. - Pp. 1-32: Andreas WILLI, The Language of Greek Comedy: Introduction and Bibliographical Sketch.
bibl.seg: WILLI Andreas (Ed.), The Language of Greek Comedy.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2002, 8°, x-343 pp. ISBN 0-19-924547-9. £50.

10 essays, first delivered as papers to the Corpus Christi Classical Seminar on 'The Language of Greek Comedy' at the University of Oxford in Michaelmas Term 1999. - Pp. 1-32: Andreas WILLI, The Language of Greek Comedy: Introduction and Bibliographical Sketch.
